results.title: Synergistic effects of atenolol and amlodipine for lowering and stabilizing blood pressure in 2K1C renovascular hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: Synergistic effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ for lowering and stabilizing blood pressure in @CELLLINE_CVCL:Z833 @@@2K1C@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Renovascular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006978 @@@renovascular hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Shen FM, Xie HH, Ling G, Xu LP, Su DF. Synergistic effects of atenolol and amlodipine for lowering and stabilizing blood pressure in 2K1C renovascular hypertensive rats. Acta Pharmacol Sin. 2005 Nov;26(11):1303-8. PMID: 16225751
citations.BibTeX: @article{16225751, title={Synergistic effects of atenolol and amlodipine for lowering and stabilizing blood pressure in 2K1C renovascular hypertensive rats.}, author={Shen FM and Xie HH and Ling G and Xu LP and Su DF}, journal={Acta Pharmacol Sin}, volume={26}, number={11}, pages={1303-8}}

results.title: [Antihypertensive effects of atenolol and nitrendipine alone or in combination on three hypertensive models of rats].
results.text_hl: In @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Renovascular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006978 @@@renovascular hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (RVHR) and @CHEMICAL_Desoxycorticosterone_Acetate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D064791 @@@DOCA@@@-salt hypertensive @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (DHR), @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Ate@@@+@CHEMICAL_Nitrendipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009568 @@@Nit@@@ (6 + 3, 20 + 10, 60 + 30 mg.kg-1) given ig once a day for 10 d reduced the blood pressure in a dose-dependent manner.

citations.NLM: Miao CY, Zhu QY, Yang YC, Su DF. [Antihypertensive effects of atenolol and nitrendipine alone or in combination on three hypertensive models of rats]. Zhongguo Yao Li Xue Bao. 1992 Sep;13(5):448-51. PMID: 1300051
citations.BibTeX: @article{1300051, title={[Antihypertensive effects of atenolol and nitrendipine alone or in combination on three hypertensive models of rats].}, author={Miao CY and Zhu QY and Yang YC and Su DF}, journal={Zhongguo Yao Li Xue Bao}, volume={13}, number={5}, pages={448-51}}

results.title: Blockade of renin-angiotensin system prevents micturition dysfunction in renovascular hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: The effects of the anti-@DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ drugs @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ (AT1 antagonist) and @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ (@GENE_ACE @GENE_24310 @@@angiotensin-converting enzyme@@@ inhibitor) in comparison with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (@GENE_ADRB1 @GENE_24925 @@@beta1-adrenoceptor@@@ antagonist independently of RAS blockade) have been investigated in @DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001745 @@@bladder and urethral dysfunctions@@@ during @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Renovascular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006978 @@@renovascular hypertension@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Ramos-Filho AC, Moscoso JA, Calmasini F, Faria Jde A, Anhê GF, Mónica FZ, Antunes E. Blockade of renin-angiotensin system prevents micturition dysfunction in renovascular hypertensive rats. Eur J Pharmacol. 2014 Sep 5;738():285-92. PMID: 24881522
citations.BibTeX: @article{24881522, title={Blockade of renin-angiotensin system prevents micturition dysfunction in renovascular hypertensive rats.}, author={Ramos-Filho AC and Moscoso JA and Calmasini F and Faria Jde A and Anhê GF and Mónica FZ and Antunes E}, journal={Eur J Pharmacol}, volume={738}, pages={285-92}}
